body:
Avicus lobby is now down so to join use this address

mczone01.avic.us      -This is to connect to mczone01

Put - (Servername).avic.us

SERVER NAMES:
nebula01
nebula02
nebula03
nebula04
mczone01
mczone02
cronus
izcus - Not sure of spelling
luna
walls01
walls02
walls03
walls04

Not sure on nexus servers....
(Change the number according to server at the side in BOLD)

Once you are in the server use the /server (ServerName) to get to others servers with out having to change the IP and exitting Avicus!

title: FIX TO GET ON AVICUS!
